committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To permit Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for a period of not more than 70 years.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to allow the Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for use other than as a cemetery so long as such use will not prevent future use for cemetery purposes.

titles.title: To permit Mount Olivet Cemetery Association of Salt Lake City, Utah, to lease a certain tract of land for a period of not more than 70 years.
